name: Alien Run (itch) (adibyw)
description:
An Alien astronaut has crash landed in an unfamiliar planet. Help him course through the planet's terrain and avoiding contact with the planet's local inhabitant to find another ship to continue his journey.

Features: 

  • Control when the alien jumps.
  • Select your preferred stage.

Gameplay & Control : Use Up Arrow or Space Key to jump

Game's source code: https://gitlab.com/Adibyw/alien-run-game-jam

Game's Asset taken from:

  • https://wallpaperaccess.com/cartoon-space
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-pack-redux
